alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 18 at 9:42PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin...Iowa... Mississippi River at Lansing affecting Vernon, Crawford, Allamakee and Houston Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Lansing. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.2 feet, Lock and Dam 9 goes out of operation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning.
